pr_title: HHH-14075: Changes to loaders and TwoPhaseLoad to allow "internal" loading to be…

timeline.message: HHH-14075 : Changes to loaders and TwoPhaseLoad to allow "internal" loading to be reused by hibernate-reactive

timeline.bodyText: If this method is exposed to the public, we might change the last parameter type to Iterable<? extends PreloadEventListener> to be more robust. Not 100% sure, though.
timeline.author: NathanQingyangXu
